result.arabic_text: وَٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
result.translation: 37. Oo ku samee Doonni Indhahayaga hor- tooda iyo (si waafaqsan) Waxyigayaga, hana igala hadlin arrinka kuwa dulmiga (shirkiga iyo macaasida) fala; waa la harqine.
